issue.title: [C++] Pass task size / metrics in Executor API
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8847](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8847). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For now, our ThreadPool implementation would ignore those metrics, but other implementations may use it for custom ordering.

Example metrics:
- IO size (number of bytes)
- CPU cost (~ number of instructions)
- Priority (opaque integer? lower is more urgent)
